titles.title: CB 166 Lord, All That You Are We Want

properties.copyright: Â©1984 Maranatha! Music, Willing Heart Music (Maranatha! Music)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
LORD, ALL THAT YOU ARE WE WANT.
All that You allow we embrace.
Because You alone are good,
All that You are we want.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, all that You are we need.
All that You are we receive.
Be to each of us our total desire.
All that You are we need.
